thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com | 7 of 185
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: I was searching for a song that needed a very specific mood and pace and found Pond5 the best place to search. Being able to roll over songs from my search allowed me to very quickly preview over 100 songs before finding the right fit. I edited with the "watermarked" version and just downloaded the purchased version. I was very happy to take advantage of the sale. I couldn't be happier with the process or the song I ended up with.
